channel.title: Ip board
channel.description:
Hello, moparscape users.
I've a question ( ip board ):
Okay, so how can i make the player names Colored and with a icon like this: http://prntscr.com/ejzhy .
Thanks for reading.

item.title: Ip board
item.dc:creator: @timothecoder timothecoder
item.description:
@timothecoder wrote:

why is this picture and text so offset on my forum? how to change it?

my forum: http://prntscr.com/l0wgu http://prntscr.com/l0wgu
Not my forum: http://prntscr.com/l0wj8

Read full topic

item.title: Ip board
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

timothecoder:

Got it lol, problem was i wasn’t uploaded the “shoutbox.js” so, i uploaded it now to public > jr > shoutbox.js and it’s worked^^

Good to hear your problems are solved, timo. Any other developmental errors you get, post them in here and you’ll get help quickly.

Read full topic

item.title: Ip board
item.dc:creator: @timothecoder timothecoder
item.description:
@timothecoder wrote:

Got it lol, problem was i wasn’t uploaded the “shoutbox.js” so, i uploaded it now to public > jr > shoutbox.js and it’s worked^^

item.title: Ip board
item.dc:creator: @timothecoder timothecoder
item.description:
@timothecoder wrote:

[quote=“Ruby, post:15, topic:456917”][quote author=timothecoder link=topic=559859.msg4092390#msg4092390 date=1346518278]

[quote author=The Web Guy link=topic=559859.msg4092385#msg4092385 date=1346517844]

Ik it’s from your forum . called zealusion.

whats name of the hook? :o

(SOS33)Group Color in User Personal Card Link 1.2.0

I think, if not, it’ll be something similar.
[/quote]OMG FINALLY THANKS i luv you ( no homo ).

I’m happy to help :P.

got one more question how to change this : http://prntscr.com/er8ka to a other title lol

Search in the admincp “invision power board” and it should give you an option to change it.

Thanks, btw you know a works shoutbox software? i got one btw can’t shout …

Shoutbox or Chatbox? Both somewhat similar but try googling “Open source PHP shoutbox/chatbox”, However, you’ll probably get a better one, and have more luck searching for an Ajax one.

https://blueimp.net/ajax/
[/quote]Shoutbox.

You need to enable shouting for each user group in their permissions[/quote]Iknow , btw i can’t shout idk why…

Read full topic

Shoutbox or Chatbox? Both somewhat similar but try googling “Open source PHP shoutbox/chatbox”, However, you’ll probably get a better one, and have more luck searching for an Ajax one.

https://blueimp.net/ajax/
[/quote]Shoutbox.[/quote]

You need to enable shouting for each user group in their permissions

item.title: Ip board
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“timothecoder, post:4, topic:456917”][quote author=miller4 link=topic=559859.msg4091274#msg4091274 date=1346387640]
Go into your Member Groups > Choose a group > Add this line to Group Formatting Prefix : “Black” is the text color and “yellow” is the glow color, change as you please. After that, add to the box under that “Group Formatting Suffix” And you will have glowing names. For the icon part, I cannot help you. But I hope this helped
[/quote]Ye i got the code already but it’s only the color and icon
in online list btw i want the name glow there : http://prntscr.com/eqqut …[/quote]

Lol you took the screenshot from my forums.

Also, that requires a hook. If you’re using nulled forums, use http://forumcore.net. If you’re using bought forums, buy them from the IPB marketplace or devfuse.

Read full topic

item.title: Ip board
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

miller4:

Go into your Member Groups > Choose a group > Add this line to Group Formatting Prefix : “Black” is the text color and “yellow” is the glow color, change as you please. After that, add to the box under that “Group Formatting Suffix” And you will have glowing names. For the icon part, I cannot help you. But I hope this helped

The icon part is easy…

If you take that span code, then before it at boom, there’s your image.

Read full topic

item.title: Ip board
item.dc:creator: @miller4 miller4
item.description:
@miller4 wrote:

Go into your Member Groups > Choose a group > Add this line to Group Formatting Prefix : “Black” is the text color and “yellow” is the glow color, change as you please. After that, add to the box under that “Group Formatting Suffix” And you will have glowing names. For the icon part, I cannot help you. But I hope this helped

Read full topic
